start_message:
👋 Welcome to _FBS Rebate Bot_
Where Every Trade Earns You 100% Cashback! 💸

Trade smarter, earn faster — effortlessly.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🚀 Start in 3 Easy Steps:

1️⃣ Do you have an FBS account?
▫️ No? Tap /open_account to create one instantly.
▫️ Yes? Tap /link_account to securely connect your existing account.

2️⃣ Add Your Account Number
Tap /add_account and reply with your account number only.

3️⃣ Trade & Earn Cashback
✅ Cashback is credited automatically on every trade.
💼 No fees. No hassle. Just pure profit.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📩 Need assistance?
Type /help anytime.
open_account:
📝 Open a New FBS Account

To start earning 100% cashback on every trade, you need an active FBS account.

🌐 Open your account in seconds:
👉 https://fbs.partners?ibl=772566&ibp=32646625

Once done, return and tap /add_account to link your account.

Need assistance? Type /help.
link_account:
🔗 Link Your Existing FBS Account

Follow these simple steps to link your trading account and activate cashback:

1️⃣ Login to your FBS Personal Area
2️⃣ On the Dashboard, select the trading account you want to link
3️⃣ Go to Settings → Partner Attachment
4️⃣ Click "Attach", then enter our IB ID: 32646625
5️⃣ Confirm by pressing "Attach" again ✅

✅ Once linked, tap /add_account and send your account number to activate cashback.

❓ Need help? Just type /help — we’re ready to support you.
add_account: 📨 Please send your FBS Trading account number:
received_account:
✅ Your account has been received.
Our team is processing it — cashback will be activated shortly.
💰 Get ready to earn 100% cashback!
invalid_account:
⚠️ Invalid input.
To get started, please send your FBS account number only.
Example: 12345678

Don't have an account yet?
Tap /open_account to create one.
help:
ℹ️ Need Help?

If you have questions or need assistance, our team is here for you.

You can:
• Tap /start to see the onboarding steps again
• Tap /open_account to create a new FBS account
• Tap /link_account to attach your trading account
• Tap /add_account to activate your cashback

We're glad to have you with us!
